title: How to make climate finance work for everyone - World Economic Forum
summary: Climate finance needs to be scaled up and redesigned so that governments, investors and businesses prioritize green solutions. Transitioning to a decarbonized economy offers many benefits, including eradicating poverty, reducing inequality and offering decent employment for all.

title: Why CPG Leaders Must Reimagine Business Models | BCG - BCG
summary: Many CPG companies have set net-zero commitments, but few are on track to meet their 2030 emissions reduction targets. Partnershipping for collaboration and reimagining business models are critical to making sufficient head way toward decarbonization by innovating products and business processes. While technology improvements will play a key role, embracing new sustainable business models and building new markets can drive change in the near term, within the existing technology landscape.
green_innovation: TRUE. The article describes the development of new business models and green products and processes as a way to reduce emissions on the path to net-zero.
business_innovation: TRUE. The article describes rethinking and changing business models as a critical step to achieving decarbonization goals.
green_product: TRUE. The article describes the development of green products as a critical step to achieving decarbonization goals.
green_process: TRUE. The article describes the development of green processes as a critical step to achieving decarbonization goals.

title: HYZON MOTORS, PERFORMANCE FOOD GROUP SIGN AGREEMENT FOR FUEL CELL TRUCKS - PR Newswire
summary: Hyzon Motors, a supplier of fuel cell electric mobility, and Performance Food Group (PFG), a food and foodservice distribution company, have announced a collaboration to deploy up to 50 hydrogen-powered fuel cell electric trucks. Hyzon will provide its proprietary fuel cell technology, while PFG will integrate the trucks into its commercial delivery operations. The initiative aims to reduce greenhouse gas emissions and promote sustainability in the transportation sector.
green_innovation: TRUE, the innovation is the development and deployment of hydrogen-powered fuel cell electric trucks, which contribute to environmental sustainability goals by reducing greenhouse gas emissions.
business_innovation: TRUE, the innovation involves the implementation of a new product, the hydrogen-powered fuel cell electric truck, which differs significantly from PFG's previous fleet vehicles.
green_product: TRUE, the hydrogen-powered fuel cell electric truck is a green product as it is designed to reduce negative environmental externalities by producing zero emissions during operation.
green_process: FALSE, the article does not describe a specific green process.
company: Hyzon Motors and Performance Food Group

title: Tesla Of The Sea? How EV Tech Is Revolutionizing Boating - Markets Insider
summary: Vision Marine Technologies Inc (NASDAQ:VMAR) is a company that has developed a proprietary marine electric motor with accompanying battery pack and software that is poised to transform the boating industry. The company is expected to collect its first revenues from the PowerTrain battery technology this year and expects to be cash-flow positive by 2024.

title: The Subduing Love for Coal! - TimesTech
summary: Renewable energy is expected to account for 35% of the global electricity mix by 2025, with solar and wind power leading the growth. Asia will account for half of the world's electricity consumption by 2025, and coal will remain the main fuel in the region despite a declining share.
